# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a header-footer view from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating the view

- **init(reuseIdentifier:)**: Initializes a header-footer view with the specified reuse identifier.
